branchCategory.name: LECS
branchCategory.description: SMC's LECS series is an AC servo motor controller, available in incremental or absolute encoder compatible types.  The LECSA is a pulse input, positioning type for an incremental encoder, and the LECSB is a pulse input type for an absolute encoder.  Also available in the series are the LECSC, CC-Link direct input type for an absolute encoder, and the LECSS, SSCNETlll type for an absolute encoder.

branchItem.name: LECS*, AC Servo Motor Controller, Pulse Input Type
branchItem.description: SMC's LECS series is an AC servo motor controller, available in incremental or absolute encoder compatible types.  The LECSA is a pulse input, positioning type for an incremental encoder, and the LECSB is a pulse input type for an absolute encoder.  Also available in the series are the LECSC, CC-Link direct input type for an absolute encoder, and the LECSS, SSCNETlll type for an absolute encoder.
